checklist.Text: Bring Fill-in mixture to room temperature and place in tube rack
Remove ML Prep Plate from thermocycler but continue to run ML_RT_Hybridize program
Place ML Plate in the highlighted area
Place Broadcast Plate in highlighted area
Seal ML Prep plate with clear PCR seal
Put ML Prep plate back on thermocycler and continue ML_RT_Hybridize program for exactly 60 minutes
